name: Eternity Entrance
description:
Escape room where you decide your fate..

Physics based puzzle game, originally meant to be a VR game.

Spring 2020 student project

Controls

W,A,S,D - move

SPACE - jump

LEFT MOUSE BUTTON - pick up objects

RIGHT MOUSE BUTTON - when holding object rotates object

F - interact with objects

R - zoom

ESC - exit the game

Please give us feedback: https://forms.gle/H49we37Snapd7f366
